item.title: Findon Road N9 weekly street cleaning missed., 25th November
item.description:
Sorry cannot load this to Enfield website. Findon Road Edmonton has not been swept for a few weeks..wet leaves that has now turned to mud and litter everywhere please can we get the weekly schedule back on Wednesday as per the website says. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Findon Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown Tree (unfixed), 25th November
item.description:
THIS ISSUE IS NOT FIXED - DO NOT IGNORE There is an overgrown plane tree on Kenworthy Road. Although it has now lost its leaves, it is still excessively overgrown, the branches still smash into the building windows and block out the light. We are worried that it will cause a breakage in a strong storm. This requires cutting back to promote healthy growth again next summer. THIS ISSUE WAS FIRST REPORTED IN OCTOBER AND HAS BEEN FALSELY LISTED AS FIXED
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14-16, Kenworthy Road, Homerton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
